com.frankly.franklysdk.service

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frankly.franklysdk.service.Manager
      • com.frankly.franklysdk.service.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends Manager
    The main interface for sending, retrieving, or deleting Messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MessageManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)

      • clearLocalStorage

        public void clearLocalStorage()
        Deletes all Messages stored locally.

      • clearLocalStorage

        public void clearLocalStorage(Room room)
        Deletes all Messages stored locally for the given Room.

      • deleteLocally

        public void deleteLocally(Message message)
        Deletes a Message from local storage. Note that it is only possible to delete messages that have a Message.Status of FAILED, PENDING_MEDIA, or PENDING_MESSAGE.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to delete.

      • deleteUnsent

        public void deleteUnsent()
        Deletes all Messages that have yet to be sent to the server. This is made up of Messages that have a Message.Status of FAILED, PENDING_MEDIA, or PENDING_MESSAGE.

      • fetchPreviousMessage

        public Message fetchPreviousMessage(long roomId,
                                    Message offsetMessage,
                                    boolean sticky)
                             throws ParseException,
                                    IOException,
                                    AuthenticationException
        Fetches the immediately previous Message from remote storage in the given Room's ID that are older than the given Message.
        Parameters:
        roomId - The Room's ID to fetch the Message of.
        sticky - Filter about sticky attribute.
        offsetMessage - The message to use as an exclusive starting point when searching for older sticky message.
        Returns:
        The immediate previous Message older than the offset Message.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException
        AuthenticationException

      • fetchPreviousMessage

        public Message fetchPreviousMessage(long roomId,
                                    Message offsetMessage)
                             throws ParseException,
                                    IOException,
                                    AuthenticationException
        Fetches the immediately previous Message from remote storage in the given Room's ID that are older than the given Message.
        Parameters:
        roomId - The Room's ID to fetch the Message of.
        offsetMessage - The message to use as an exclusive starting point when searching for older sticky message.
        Returns:
        The immediate previous Message older than the offset Message.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException
        AuthenticationException

      • flag

        public void flag(Message message)
          throws IOException,
                 AuthenticationException,
                 ParseException
        Marks the given Message as flagged.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to mark as flagged.
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the given Message.

      • get

        public List<Message> get(Room room)
                  throws ParseException,
                         IOException,
                         AuthenticationException,
                         StorageModificationException
        Retrieves the default number of most recent Messages in the given Room. Note that if fewer than the default number of Messages exist, they will all be returned.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the Messages of.
        Returns:
        The most recent Messages in the given Room, up to a maximum count of the default number.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add, update, or delete) failed.

      • get

        public List<Message> get(Room room,
                         int count)
                  throws ParseException,
                         IOException,
                         AuthenticationException,
                         StorageModificationException
        Retrieves the specified number of most recent Messages in the given Room. Note that if fewer than the specified number of Messages exist, they will all be returned.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the Messages of.
        count - The maximum number of Messages to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The most recent Messages in the given Room, up to a maximum count of the specified number.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add, update, or delete) failed.

      • get

        public List<Message> get(Room room,
                         Message offsetMessage)
                  throws ParseException,
                         StorageModificationException,
                         AuthenticationException,
                         IOException
        Retrieves the default number of most recent Messages in the given Room that are older than the given Message. Note that if fewer than the default number of Messages exist that meet the criteria, they will all be returned.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the Messages of.
        offsetMessage - The message to use as an exclusive starting point when searching for older messages.
        Returns:
        The most recent Messages older than the offset Message in the given Room, up to a maximum count of the default number.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add, update, or delete) failed.

      • get

        public List<Message> get(Room room,
                         Message offsetMessage,
                         int count)
                  throws ParseException,
                         IOException,
                         AuthenticationException,
                         StorageModificationException
        Retrieves the specified number of most recent Messages in the given Room that are older than the given Message. Note that if fewer than the specified number of Messages exist that meet the criteria, they will all be returned.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room to retrieve the Messages of.
        offsetMessage - The message to use as an exclusive starting point when searching for older messages.
        count - The maximum number of Messages to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The most recent Messages older than the offset Message in the given Room, up to a maximum count of the specified number.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the offset Message.
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add, update, or delete) failed.

      • registerForChanges

        public void registerForChanges(Manager.OnChangeListener<Message> onChangeListener)
        Registers the OnChangeListener as a listener of changes made to any Message of any type.
        Parameters:
        onChangeListener - The OnChangeListener to notify when changes are made to any Message.

      • replace

        public List<Message> replace(List<Message> messages,
                             Room room)
                      throws StorageModificationException
        Replaces the existing collection of saved Messages for the given Room with the given collection.
        Parameters:
        messages - The new Messages meant to replace the existing saved ones.
        room - The Room to replace the Message of.
        Throws:
        StorageModificationException - One of the replacement operations (either add, update, or delete) failed.

      • restartMessageSender

        public void restartMessageSender(android.content.Context context)
        Shuts down the existing MessageSender, if any, and then starts up a new one.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context to tie the new MessageSender to.

      • save

        public List<Message> save(List<Message> messages)
        Saves the given Messages (that have already been sent/received) locally.
        Parameters:
        messages - The Messages to save.
        Returns:
        The saved Messages.

      • save

        public void save(Message message)
          throws StorageModificationException
        Saves an already sent/received Message locally.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to save.
        Throws:
        StorageModificationException - Adding, removing, or replacing a TextMetadata object failed.

      • send

        public void send(Message message)
          throws IOException,
                 AuthenticationException,
                 ParseException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 StorageModificationException
        Sends a Message to the assigned Room.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to send.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The Room that the Message was supposed to go to no longer exists.
        IOException
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
        ParseException - Failed to parse either the "created on" or "modified on" Date of the user tied to the given Message.
        InterruptedException - Failed to queue up the message for sending.
        StorageModificationException - Adding, removing, or replacing a TextMetadata object failed.

      • shutdownMessageSender

        public void shutdownMessageSender()
        Shuts down the existing MessageSender, if any.

      • unregisterForChanges

        public void unregisterForChanges(Manager.OnChangeListener<Message> onChangeListener)
        Unregisters the given listener so that it is no longer notified of changes.
        Parameters:
        onChangeListener - The OnChangeListener to unregister.

      • uploadImage

        public String uploadImage(android.content.Context context,
                          android.net.Uri uri)
                   throws IOException,
                          AuthenticationException
        Uploads the image specified in the Intent, specified by the data Uri of the Intent or an extra called "data" which stores a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context with which to associate this request.
        uri - The location of the image.
        Returns:
        The remote URL String where the user avatar is stored.
        Throws:
        IOException - The network request failed or was interrupted.
        AuthenticationException - Unable to properly authenticate the current user.
